last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 8
last_episode_to_air.overview: As the crew embark on the final leg of their journey to Arcadia, a collision with an asteroid causes problems.

name: Intergalactic
overview: The story of fearless young cop and galactic pilot, Ash Harper, who has her glittering career ripped away from her after being wrongly convicted of a treasonous crime and exiled to a distant prison colony.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: In the outskirts of outer space, a fearless young cop and galactic pilot finds her life change forever when accused of treason.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: As the Hemlock fugitives set about salvaging their crash-landed ship, Ash makes her escape through an alien desert in a desperate attempt to call home. En route she makes an unwelcome acquaintance of scruffy space-pirate, Echo Nantu-Rose.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Drifting through space without coordinates, the gang encounter a new setback as the Hemlock is running out of power. The solution is robbing a fuel reserve.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: The gang ditch the Hemlock in favour of something a little less conspicuous. The group end up getting more than they bargained for when they encounter the eccentric Professor Blake.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: In search of medical attention for Ash, the Hemlock makes a stop on Candy's home planet of Skov. However, their new destination is in some trouble.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Tensions run high after Emma's capture and Ash finds herself alone. Meanwhile, the band make a discovery aboard the ship.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Opinions are divided as Ash suggests a risky rescue mission on Emma's behalf. Could a poker game provide better odds?

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: As the crew embark on the final leg of their journey to Arcadia, a collision with an asteroid causes problems.
